name: Wezterm Server
description: Installs wezterm-mux-server and wezterm CLI for headless terminal multiplexing via SSH domains. Extracts binaries from platform-native packages to avoid X11/Wayland GUI dependencies.

sshPort.description: SSH port for wezterm-mux-server access. When used with lace, this is auto-assigned from the 22425-22499 range.

createRuntimeDir.description: Create /run/user/<uid> runtime directory for wezterm-mux-server (UID resolved from _REMOTE_USER)
